bo_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
bo_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
bo_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR bo_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY bo_idx DESC LIMIT #{cri.skip}, #{cri.amount}
